snippet.title: Resident Evil Village VR Mode - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Get up close and personal. Resident Evil Village VR Mode launches on February 22 for PlayStation PSVR2 as a free DLC for Resident Evil Village!
https://www.residentevil.com/village/
#residentevil  #residentevilvillage  #capcom

http://www.facebook.com/residentevil
